attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it`s time for the govenment to put a block on immigration, we are only a small island and cannot take anymore onto our shores  you can`t cope with the influx it`s costing us the people large amount of money, & making sky high prices

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
